thread.title: Ed
thread.title_full: Preferred Patron Customer Loyalty reviewed by Ed

author: Ed
title: Ed
text:
Our Preferred Patron rewards program has been a highly effective allocation of our marketing budget! We have enjoyed 9 years of success with our Preferred Patron Loyalty program, which started in 2008.
Preferred Patron ranks among the very best of the vendors we ever dealt with!
Always reliable service, in terms of operation and support.
Handles our 70+ store chain effortlessly.
Supports 1.4 million participating members without issue.
Preferred Patron is a proven marketing solution â€“ our loyalty members spent, on average, 5x more than non-members.
We have contributed great success over the years to our loyalty program. I would highly recommend Preferred Patron to any business, large or small!
